newsitem.title: JAPAN: Japan Aug 1st 10 days trade surplus 235.61 bln yen.
newsitem.headline: Japan Aug 1st 10 days trade surplus 235.61 bln yen.

text.p: Japan's customs-cleared trade posted a 235.61 billion yen surplus in the first 10 days of August, compared with a revised 205.48 billion yen surplus in the same period a year earlier, the Finance Ministry said on Monday.
This compared with a trade deficit of 25.21 billion yen in the first 10 days of July.
Free on board (FOB) exports rose 11.1 percent to 1.26 trillion yen from a year earlier, while cost, insurance and freight (CIF) imports rose 10.3 percent to 1.03 trillion yen.
